Adds filter reducer, actions, selectors
Adds 'active filter' section (ActiveFilters component)
Adds RecipeCombobox, RecipeCount, ActiveFilters, GroupMenu components
Adds filter API calls (not the actual API responses, though)

title: #395 Active Filters
body:
Related to #395 

- Adds filter reducer, actions, selectors
- Adds 'active filter' section (ActiveFilters component)
- Adds RecipeCombobox, RecipeCount, ActiveFilters, GroupMenu components
- Adds filter API calls (_not_ the actual API responses, though)
- Adds recipe list caching (user adds filter -> if that filter was loaded already, that list is shown -> api call is still made -> list is updated with fresh server results)
- Adds filter tests
- Adds a handful of missing util tests

NOTE: I'd like @mythmon or @rehandalal to check out the tests, specifically the API tests (the `LOAD_FILTERS` stuff in `test_filterActions`) - I had copied other API tests as an example, but I'm not totally convinced it's as thorough as it could/should be. After that, I'll request a QA review.
